name: Hybrid Battery Module
description: High-performance lithium-ion hybrid battery module designed for extended lifespan and reliable energy output.

name: Inverter & Power Control Unit
description: Advanced inverter and power control unit for seamless energy conversion and efficiency in hybrid vehicles.

name: Cooling Fan Assembly
description: Durable cooling fan assembly to prevent overheating and maintain optimal engine and battery temperature.

name: Hybrid Starter Motor
description: Reliable starter motor designed specifically for hybrid vehicle systems for smooth ignition.

name: Regenerative Braking Sensor
description: High-precision sensor that optimizes regenerative braking and improves energy recovery efficiency.

name: Hybrid ECU Controller
description: Electronic control unit (ECU) for hybrid vehicles, ensuring smooth integration of engine and electric systems.

name: HVAC Compressor
description: Efficient HVAC compressor for hybrid vehicles, providing superior climate control without draining battery power.

name: Hybrid Transmission Controller
description: Advanced transmission controller to manage gear shifts smoothly and efficiently in hybrid vehicles.

name: High-Voltage Wiring Harness
description: Durable and insulated wiring harness to safely transmit power between hybrid battery and systems.

name: Hybrid Cooling Pump
description: Energy-efficient coolant pump to maintain optimal temperature for hybrid systems and batteries.
